column3: Latest;Kampong Chhnang:  Joint Task Force “Mike” has been established in conjunction with CNP and Kompong Chhnang police command to investigate the ------brutal kidnapping
column4: rape and murder------ of a 5 year old girl in the province on November 12.------Forensic crime scene and homicide experts have again examined the multiple scenes involved in this heinous crime.------“It was a brutal attack and violent assault on a defensive child
column5: we will use all resources available to ensure the person or persons responsible are bought to justice”  James McCabe
